summary: This mod replaces the textures of town guards\' shields and hold banners with new, much more detailed versions.
descriptionHtml:
The textures for the city guards\' shields and the hold banners have been completely remade from scratch with much higher detail. They are now 4 times as big as the original ones.

Please take a look at the screenshots which show all the new textures.

[b]Info update:
Better Banners will now be a separate project and they will no longer be included in this mod. So far, the banners project is on hold.[/b]

[b]Update 29 November 2011:
 Added worn-out version. Includes the worn-out textures for all the guard shields. Look for optional file under the downloads. Check out the screenshots too.[/b]

[b]As of the current version 0.5, this mod improves the following textures:[/b]
Guard Shield - Solitude
Guard Shield - Pale
Guard Shield - Whiterun
Guard Shield - Windhelm
Guard Shield - Hjaalmarch
Guard Shield - Falkreath
Guard Shield - Markarth
Guard Shield - Riften
Guard Shield - Winterhold

Hold Banner - Solitude

In the upcoming versions, more hold banners will be improved.


[b]Installation and removal instructions are included in the readame file in the mod\'s archive.[/b]

To get the best out of your visual gaming experience and of this mod, I highly reccomend you to try the Skyrim Enhaned Shaders mod, found here:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=822
with \"no bloom, high saturation\" ini file.



Please, check out my other mods:
[center]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8038][img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/3931/coloreddragonscale.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10240][img]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/6045/pickupthebones.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=780][img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/6910/draugtshouts.png[/img][/url]

[/center]
author: Dragten
